data.name: AndItem
data.value: Logic: Combine profiles with AND

data.name: CountAsEqualToItem
data.value: Count As: Must be equal to given number

data.name: CountAsNotEqualToItem
data.value: Count As: Must not be equal to given number

data.name: ExceptItem
data.value: Logic: Exclude profiles

data.name: HasCastItem
data.value: Cast: Must contain cast members (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: HasCrewItem
data.value: Crew: Must contain crew members (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: HasCustomMediaTypeItem
data.value: Media Type: Custom Type must be set (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: HasEventItem
data.value: Event: Must contain event of the given type and user (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: HasOnlinePrivateExclusionItem
data.value: Exclusion: Must be excluded from online private listing (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: HasOnlinePublicExclusionItem
data.value: Exclusion: Must be excluded from online public listing (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: HasPDAExclusionItem
data.value: Exclusion: Must be excluded from DVD Profiler Mobile (PDA) (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: HasSmartPhoneExclusionItem
data.value: Exclusion: Must be excluded from DVD Profiler for iPhone / Android (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: IsCollectionNumberSetItem
data.value: Collection Number: Must be set (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: IsCollectionTypeItem
data.value: Collection Type: Must be part of given collection type

data.name: IsCustomMediaTypeItem
data.value: Media Type: Custom Type must be equal to given custom media type

data.name: IsMediaTypeBluRayItem
data.value: Media Type: Must be Blu-ray (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: IsMediaTypeDVDItem
data.value: Media Type: Must be DVD (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: IsMediaTypeHDDVDItem
data.value: Media Type: Must be HD-DVD (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: IsMediaTypeUltraHDItem
data.value: Media Type: Must be Ultra-HD (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: IsNotCollectionTypeItem
data.value: Collection Type: Must not be part of given collection type

data.name: IsNotCustomMediaTypeItem
data.value: Media Type: Custom Type must not be equal to given custom media type

data.name: IsPartOfOwnedCollectionItem
data.value: Collection Type: Must be part of Owned collection (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: IsProductionYearSet
data.value: Production Year: must be set (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: IsRunningTimeSetItem
data.value: Running Time: must be set (true = must, false = must not)

data.name: MustContainCountryOfOriginsItem
data.value: Country of Origin: Must contain countries of origin

data.name: MustContainGenreItem
data.value: Genre: Must contain given genre

data.name: MustContainGenresItem
data.value: Genre: Must contain genres

data.name: MustContainMediaCompaniesItem
data.value: Media Company: Must contain media companies

data.name: MustContainStudiosItem
data.value: Studio: Must contain studios

data.name: MustContainTagItem
data.value: Tag: Must contain given tag name

data.name: MustNotContainCountryOfOriginsItem
data.value: Country of Origin: Must not contain countries of origin

data.name: MustNotContainGenreItem
data.value: Genre: Must not contain given genre

data.name: MustNotContainGenresItem
data.value: Genre: Must not contain genres

data.name: MustNotContainMediaCompaniesItem
data.value: Media Company: Must not contain media companies

data.name: MustNotContainStudiosItem
data.value: Studio: Must not contain studios

data.name: MustNotContainTagItem
data.value: Tag: Must not contain given tag name

data.name: OrItem
data.value: Logic: Combine profiles with OR
